results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(n) = (A305421(n)+1)/2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..13106
Index entries for sequences related to polynomials in ring GF(2)[X]
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: A305421(n) = { my(f = subst(lift(factor(Pol(binary(n))*Mod(1, 2))),x,2)); for(i=1,#f~,f[i,1] = Pol(binary(A305420(f[i,1])))); fromdigits(Vec(factorback(f))%2,2); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 08 2018
